description: Returns information about a list of OpenSearch Serverless access policies.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Reviewing existing access policies helps attackers understand how to modify identities or roles to gain broader access.
Policy details reveal which principals already have data-plane permissions, indicating which compromised accounts offer the best reach.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListAccessPolicies to understand enforcement gaps, clone permissive rules, or stage privilege escalation against OpenSearch Serverless data.
